abstract: DealBook is providing live coverage of this year’s Ira Sohn Investment Research Conference, the annual gathering of top investment managers who share their biggest trade ideas.
snippet: DealBook is providing live coverage of this year’s Ira Sohn Investment Research Conference, the annual gathering of top investment managers who share their biggest trade ideas.
lead_paragraph: 8:29 p.m. | Updated Unlike previous years, this year’s Ira Sohn Investment Research Conference didn’t have any blockbuster revelations — certainly nothing on the order of David Einhorn’s bet against Lehman Brothers or William A. Ackman’s assault on MBIA, the bond insurer.

headline.main: Live From the Ira Sohn 2010 Conference

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
